Module io.inverno.mod.web
Package io.inverno.mod.web

Interface ErrorWebExchange<A extends Throwable>

Type Parameters:
A - the error type
All Superinterfaces:
ErrorExchange<A>, Exchange
public interface ErrorWebExchange<A extends Throwable> extends ErrorExchange<A>

An error exchange that extends the HTTP server ErrorExchange with features for the Web.

It especially supports response body encoding based on the response content type.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
See Also:
ErrorWebRoute, ErrorWebRouteManager, ErrorWebRouter
